Contact.intro: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
Contact.subject: Subject
Contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...

About.title: About Tiskre-DO
About.intro: We are a small family business from Tallinn, Estonia. Our mission is to bring our vision of the dream outdoor lifestyle to life — crafted in metal. If our ideas resonate with yours, we'd be truly happy to connect.
About.philosophyText: We believe good design should feel natural. Every piece we create is shaped by hand, not hype. Durable, practical and quietly beautiful — that's how we imagine the perfect outdoor space.
About.craftedText: We design and build durable products that live outdoors. Thoughtful details, honest materials and long service are at the heart of what we do.
About.peopleText: What inspires us most is the outdoors—simple forms and robust workmanship that blend into the landscape.
About.rootsText: We try to hold strong to our roots.

Instructions.title: Product Instructions
Instructions.intro: Find detailed setup, care, and usage instructions for all our products organized by category.
Instructions.contactSupport: Can't find instructions for your product?

quotes.test1: Easy setup, powerful airflow with the new compressor, and no ash falling out. You can tell this was designed by someone who actually smokes food. Highly recommended!
quotes.test2: It works beautifully — the smoke is clean, the build quality is solid, and it fits my Kamado grill perfectly.
quotes.test3: Set it up in my small smokehouse. No hassle — it just works. The smoke is smooth and steady.
quotes.test5: The best thing since sliced bread.
quotes.test6: SG2 is really a great thing.
